attributes.action: Petition to forcibly laser off Kirsten Stewarts Black Flag Tattoo
attributes.additional_details:
The signatories of this petition call on Her Majesties Government to remove Kirsten Stewarts Black Flag Tattoo by force if necessary.

She has muddied the name of the Black Flag fan and caused the ostracization and bullying of many of the people who now share this tattoo. This must stop before it's too late.
